title: SOLD: T210-2 Old Mill Neuton portrait, Roanoke Tigers, SGC...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T210-2 Old Mill Neuton portrait, Roanoke Tigers, SGC...
posts.post_content:
For sale is this nice T210 Series 2 Old Mill portrait.  It depicts Eugene Neuton of the Roanoke Tigers.

The price is $SOLD via PP "gift", check, money order, delivered in the contiguous U.S.

I have other T210s, from all series, available if interested.  Thank you.

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/t210-old-mill/82641/neuton[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/t210-old-mill/82642/neuton[/IMG]
Hi K, If still available, I’ll take it
